content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --PRESP
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --PRESP
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: Y
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0085
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when --PRESP does not equal 'Y' or is not empty.
Outcome:
  Message: --PRESP does not equal 'Y' or is not empty.
  Output Variables:
    - --PRESP
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0085
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Events[--PRESP][Value is "Y" for prespecified events,
                  null for spontaneously reported events.] Interventions[--PRESP][Values
                  should be "Y" or null.]
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --PRESP
                Section: Events|Interventions
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.3'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0085
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Model v1.7[2.2.1 (Interventions )][--PRESP; Values
                  should be "Y" or null.] | Model v1.7[2.2.2 (Events)][--PRESP; Values
                  should be "Y" or null.]
                Document: Model v1.7
                Item: ''
                Section: Model v1.7[2.2.1 (Interventions)]|Model v1.7[2.2.2 (Events)]
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.2'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0085
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Model v1.4[2.2.1 (Interventions )][--PRESP; Values
                  should be "Y" or null.] |Model v1.4[2.2.2 (Events)][--PRESP; Values
                  should be "Y" or null.]
                Document: Model v1.4
                Item: ''
                Section: Model v1.4[2.2.1 (Interventions)]|Model v1.4[2.2.2 (Events)]
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - DS
      - DV
      - EX

json.Description: Raise an error when --PRESP does not equal 'Y' or is not empty.

Outcome.Message: --PRESP does not equal 'Y' or is not empty.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Events[--PRESP][Value is "Y" for prespecified events, null for spontaneously reported events.] Interventions[--PRESP][Values should be "Y" or null.]
Model v1.7[2.2.1 (Interventions )][--PRESP; Values should be "Y" or null.] | Model v1.7[2.2.2 (Events)][--PRESP; Values should be "Y" or null.]
Model v1.4[2.2.1 (Interventions )][--PRESP; Values should be "Y" or null.] |Model v1.4[2.2.2 (Events)][--PRESP; Values should be "Y" or null.]
